name: Tentacool

attacks.name: Jelly Swarm
attacks.effect: Reveal the top 7 cards of your deck. Put any Tentacool or Tentacruel you find there into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

flavor: Trying to be cool can make you cruel. The Pokemon universe is truly deep.
